text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Pierre Charles L'Enfant
text.summary: Pierre Charles L'Enfant was a French-born American revolutionary who served in the Continental Army during the Revolutionary War followed by a career in civil engineering which included redesigning New York's city hall and designing the basic plan for Washington, D.C. (the L'Enfant Plan).
